title: A Comprehensive Guide to CAN IDS Data & Introduction of the ROAD Dataset
abstract: Although ubiquitous in modern vehicles, Controller Area Networks (CANs) lack basic security properties and are easily exploitable. A rapidly growing field of CAN security research has emerged that seeks to detect intrusions on CANs. Producing vehicular CAN data with a variety of intrusions is out of reach for most researchers as it requires expensive assets and expertise. To assist researchers, we present the first comprehensive guide to the existing open CAN intrusion datasets, including a quality analysis of each dataset and an enumeration of each's benefits, drawbacks, and suggested use case. Current public CAN IDS datasets are limited to real fabrication (simple message injection) attacks and simulated attacks often in synthetic data, which lack fidelity. In general, the physical effects of attacks on the vehicle are not verified in the available datasets. Only one dataset provides signal-translated data but not a corresponding raw binary version. Overall, the available data pigeon

Title: A Comprehensive Guide to CAN IDS Data & Introduction of the ROAD Dataset
Abstract: Although ubiquitous in modern vehicles, Controller Area Networks (CANs) lack basic security properties and are easily exploitable. A rapidly growing field of CAN security research has emerged that seeks to detect intrusions on CANs. Producing vehicular CAN data with a variety of intrusions is out of reach for most researchers as it requires expensive assets and expertise. To assist researchers, we present the first comprehensive guide to the existing open CAN intrusion datasets, including a quality analysis of each dataset and an enumeration of each's benefits, drawbacks, and suggested use case. Current public CAN IDS datasets are limited to real fabrication (simple message injection) attacks and simulated attacks often in synthetic data, which lack fidelity. In general, the physical effects of attacks on the vehicle are not verified in the available datasets. Only one dataset provides signal-translated data but not a corresponding raw binary version. Overall, the available data pigeon
translated_title: 《CAN IDS数据综合指南及ROAD数据集介绍》
translated_abstract: 虽然现代车辆中普遍存在着控制器局域网（CAN），但CAN缺乏基本的安全特性，容易受到攻击。CAN安全研究领域迅速发展，致力于检测CAN上的入侵。为了帮助研究人员，我们首次提出了现有开放式CAN入侵数据集的综合指南，包括对每个数据集的质量分析以及各自的优点、缺点和建议的使用案例。当前公开的CAN IDS数据集仅限于真实制造（简单信息插入）攻击和使用合成数据进行模拟攻击，缺乏保真度。总体上，现有数据集中未验证攻击对车辆的物理影响。只有一个数据集提供了信号转换数据，但没有相应的原始二进制版本。
tldr: 提供了现有开放式CAN入侵数据集的综合指南，包括对每个数据集的质量分析以及各自的优点、缺点和建议的使用案例。当前数据集仅限于真实制造和模拟攻击，缺乏保真度和对车辆物理影响的验证。
en_tdlr: A comprehensive guide to the existing open CAN intrusion datasets is provided, including a quality analysis of each dataset and an enumeration of each's benefits, drawbacks, and suggested use case. Current datasets are limited to real fabrication and simulated attacks, lacking fidelity and verification of the physical effects on vehicles.
